entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 13.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 11:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Condition: Smoke

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 35 %

Wind: ESE 14 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Smoke. Low 9.
entry.summary: Widespread smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Widespread smoke. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
